Expertise Utilization in Hybrid Teams

This research aims to build understanding of how remote and hybrid work configurations influence expertise utilization in teams.

My Role

I’m working with Tyler R. Talbot to analyze findings from a lab study examining differences in performance and process associated with work configuration (face-to-face, remote, hybrid).

Status

This project is in the analysis stage with the goal of submitting to a journal venue in the organizational sciences.
